member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.HeatMap.SfHeatMap.SelectedItem
member.summary: Gets or sets the currently selected item in the .
member.value: The selected object in the , or 'null' if no item is selected. The default value is 'null'.
member.remarks: When you set the property to an object, the attempts to make that object the currently selected item. If the object is found, the property is set to the corresponding UIElement. If the object does not exist, the property is left at its current value.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.HeatMap.SfHeatMap.SelectedItemProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.HeatMap.SfHeatMap.SelectedHeatMapCell
member.summary: Gets the of the currently selected item in the .
member.remarks: The property on the control is a read-only property and is set to an UIElement of the item in the property.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.HeatMap.SfHeatMap.SelectedHeatMapCellProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.HeatMap.SelectionChangedEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for the event that is raised when the selection changes in a .
member.remarks: This class inherits from EventArgs and includes information about the old and new selected items as well as their corresponding values in a heat map.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.HeatMap.SelectionChangedEventArgs.OldItem
member.summary: Gets or sets the old selected item.
member.remarks: This property contains the item that was previously selected before the change.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.HeatMap.SelectionChangedEventArgs.NewItem
member.summary: Gets or sets the new selected item.
member.remarks: This property contains the item that is currently selected after the change.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.HeatMap.SelectionChangedEventArgs.OldValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the old value associated with the old selected item in a .
member.remarks: This property contains the value associated with the old selected item.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.HeatMap.SelectionChangedEventArgs.NewValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the new value associated with the new selected item in a .
member.remarks: This property contains the value associated with the new selected item.
